lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankworkers' leaders said that a national strike launched yesterday to press for a 100 pct immediate pay rise and monthly salary adjustments had the support of most of the 700,000 workforce.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said the universities were strapped for cash and that the association suspected the junior partner in the coalition government, the Liberal Front Party, PFL, of using education funds for projects which had helped their candidates in elections.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "If this goes on for more than a few days it will have a serious effect because normal financial operations will grind to a halt," said a western diplomat in Sao Paulo.
